channel.title: Mathy on mwaura.AI
channel.description: Recent content in Mathy on mwaura.AI

item.title: Reinforcement Learning: From Bandits to GRPO â€“ A Journey Through Decision-Making
item.description: Every day, we interact with our world and make decisions based on experience. Whether eating out or whether to use the stairs or the elevator, every day we make a decision. Sometimes we’re doing what we know and sometimes we’re winging it with something new. These are a form of reinforcement learning. This form of learning is at the heart of most living things; with infants learning to walk by making mistakes and elephants in a zoo learning that electric fence must be kept away from.
